title: Do AI think when player thinking
content:
_From [muaddib2...@gmail.com](https://code.google.com/u/110287243301853727062/) on December 05, 2011 13:22:45_

Enhancement:
I offer for optimization do AI think when player thinking as did in chess. When player do turn AI doesn't lose decision tree, it truncate tree, selecting variant that player do, and continue think. In result  decrement time to think in player turn.
